name: 3-D-Autorennen
overview: 3-D-Autorennen is a German language driving game. It's not so much a racer per se as it is a game in which you must dodge other cars for as long as you can. It was developed by Rüdiger Linden and published as a type-in by Data Becker GmbH in their book "C64 Superspiele selbstgemacht" in 1985.
